rqdatatable 1.1.1
  • Reference

  • Changelog

Direct non-sql (function) node, not implemented for data.table case.

Source: R/relop_non_sql.R
ex_data_table.relop_non_sql.Rd

Passes a single table to a function that takes a single data.frame as its argument, and returns a single data.frame.

# S3 method for relop_non_sql
ex_data_table(optree, ..., tables = list(),
  source_usage = NULL, source_limit = NULL, env = parent.frame())

Arguments

optree

relop operations tree.
...

not used, force later arguments to bind by name.
tables

named list map from table names used in nodes to data.tables and data.frames.
source_usage

list mapping source table names to vectors of columns used.
source_limit

if not null limit all table sources to no more than this many rows (used for debugging).
env

environment to work in.

See also

rq_df_funciton_node, rq_df_grouped_funciton_node

Examples


set.seed(3252)
d <- data.frame(a = rnorm(1000), b = rnorm(1000))

optree <- local_td(d) %.>%
  quantile_node(.)
ex_data_table(optree)
#>    quantile_probability           a           b
#> 1:                 0.00 -3.50439920 -3.28609345
#> 2:                 0.25 -0.68953634 -0.65437269
#> 3:                 0.50  0.06202078 -0.02633575
#> 4:                 0.75  0.70671528  0.68149724
#> 5:                 1.00  2.80643560  2.74298098

p2 <- local_td(d) %.>%
  rsummary_node(.)
ex_data_table(p2)
#>    column index   class nrows nna nunique       min      max        mean
#> 1:      a     1 numeric  1000   0    1000 -3.504399 2.806436 0.023769312
#> 2:      b     2 numeric  1000   0    1000 -3.286093 2.742981 0.009730607
#>           sd lexmin lexmax
#> 1: 1.0276878     NA     NA
#> 2: 0.9885712     NA     NA

summary(d)
#>        a                  b            
#>  Min.   :-3.50440   Min.   :-3.286093  
#>  1st Qu.:-0.68729   1st Qu.:-0.653802  
#>  Median : 0.06250   Median :-0.023986  
#>  Mean   : 0.02377   Mean   : 0.009731  
#>  3rd Qu.: 0.70683   3rd Qu.: 0.682012  
#>  Max.   : 2.80644   Max.   : 2.742981
